text: Roshan Seth OBE (born 2 April 1942) is a British-Indian actor, director and writer. He is best known for his role as Jawaharlal Nehru in Richard Attenborough's Academy Award-winning movie Gandhi and as Chattar Lal in Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom. In 2019, he appeared in the Disney movie Dumbo as Pramesh Singh. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Roshan Seth at Filmreference.com *Roshan Seth at ScreenOnline *Roshan Seth interview on NPR's All Things Considered Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from London Category:Journalists from London Category:British movie actors Category:British stage actors Category:British television actors Category:British theatre directors Category:Indian journalists Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian stage actors Category:Indian television actors Category:Indian theatre directors Category:Officers of the Order of the British Empire
title: Roshan Seth
